Reviews.Content: Clean, cheap, but indeed a bit out of the way       Spacious room
Reviews.Author: mcmcBill

Reviews.Content: nice hotel This hotel appeared to be brand new when we stayed there in January 2007. We were very impressed. It didn't have a lot of extras, but the room and the rest of the hotel was immaculate. The free breakfast was not very good--there were four or five set menu items you could order, one western, the rest Chinese. It was inexpensive and definitely worth it if you are willing to stay a little out of the way.
Reviews.Author: Tianjin
